articles.title: Worst Indian film of 2023 earned Rs 1 lakh, actors didn't promote it; not Adipurush, Ganapath, Selfiee, Kisi - DNA India
articles.description: The lowest-rated Indian film of 2023 has an IMDb rating of 1.5 and was a box office disaster too, earning only Rs 1 lakh.
